CREATE TABLE CreditScores (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    credit_score INT,
    assessment_date DATE
);

    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    loan_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    loan_type VARCHAR(20),
    approval_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE LoanEligibility (
    eligibility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    loan_id INT,
    is_eligible BOOLEAN,
    reason TEXT
);
